sentences.en: But he also has a great deal of sympathy for globalisation's losers.
sentences.cn: 但是他同样在书中很大程度地表明了对全球化受害者的同情.

sentences.en: By then it would initiate the globalisation period under China's mode.
sentences.cn: 届时,将开创中国式的全球化时代.

sentences.en: First, globalisation. Increasingly, economic activity is undertaken without reference to international borders.
sentences.cn: 首先是人类经济行为的日益国际化, 全球化.

sentences.en: Globalisation has become part the intellectual vocabulary, yet about the concept.
sentences.cn: 全球化一辞已是学术用语, 然其概念定义仍未有定论.

sentences.en: Globalisation has vastly increased the opportunities for such business.
sentences.cn: 全球化给这个行业带来的机会极速增多.

sentences.en: Globalisation is a catch-all to describe increased international trade.
sentences.cn: “全球化”是个泛称，用以描述增进了的国际贸易。

sentences.en: IBM's approach is possible only because globalisation is flourishing.
sentences.cn: IBM的方法可能走得通是因为全球化正大行其道.

sentences.en: More acute inequality is wrongly perceived as an adverse consequence of globalisation.
sentences.cn: 不平等状况加剧被误认为是全球化的负面影响.

sentences.en: On the other hand, the effect of globalisation is all - pervasive.
sentences.cn: 另一方面, 全球化的影响是全方面的.

sentences.en: Others argue that OFCs may be an inevitable concomitant of globalisation.
sentences.cn: 因为这能使得那些傲慢的大国有所收敛.

sentences.en: T minus zero for Apollo was plus one for globalisation.
sentences.cn: 而阿波罗倒计时归零升空之时就是全球化开始之日.

sentences.en: The persistently high unemployment and low growth may even threaten globalisation itself.
sentences.cn: 失业率的持续高企和经济增长的持续低迷甚至可能危及全球化自身.

sentences.en: There is nothing to say that globalisation will continue indefinitely.
sentences.cn: 毋庸质疑,全球化将会继续无限地发展开来.

sentences.en: We know that globalisation can be a force for good.
sentences.cn: 我们知道,全球化会成为一股有利的力量.

sentences.en: Working together we can make globalisation work for the whole world.
sentences.cn: 齐心协力,让我们使全球化为整个世界服务.
